name: Atlas but better
description:
so yeah before you play

"Atlas but better" was made for the Wowie game jam 3.0 so in three days

controls w,a,s,d to move the camera, left click to drag planets, right click to make planets and if you press the F key and right click you can make suns but they permanent so there's a restart button, to have other planets on other suns you have to put planets on the original sun(the first one) and create the other one.

1. to play after download you open the application and extract all then do the second step and then you open the file and open the application.

2. if you cant run it  after downloading you click on "more" and it will say "run it anyway".

Fun fact this game is called "Atlas but better" cuz Atlas the titan that holds the planet (in Greek mythology) as we know and love called earth, but we can create planets too so its like we are Atlas but better,  we are taking his job.

FYI,
For the game you will be dealing with 9 different planets and 4 suns to build your solar system.
The 9 different planets are shaped differently (burger planet, ball games planet, pig planet, bee planet, earth planet, cookie planet, hot planet, ice and fire planet, green gas planet)
The 4 different suns are also colored differently: red, orange , yellow and white

and this game will hopefully be updated sometime from now.

Have fun :)
